nodes.bodyText:
You know that we can't use this structure for 4.3.x. That one is still based on Java 6.
Saying that it raises a question to you: why do you ask for 4.3.x if you don't use Java 6 any more?

Ho crap sorry..
We keep 4.3.x because of spring version. We not upgrade the project to a 5+ spring version yet :/
I have to create a new pull request for 4.3.x? I'm not familiar with your usage. I'm so sorry
No, you don't: I'll back port it properly. Just curious why do you need fix in the version for Java 6, when you definitely could move already to 5.x generation if you don't use Java 6 any more...
